Package OrderingSystem

package OrderingSystem
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Cart
    Contains all of the methods that has something to do with the Cart feature.
    Computations
    Handles all of the computations that will happen throughout the program.
    Main
    The most crucial in the execution of the program because this is where the main method is located.
    Products
    Accommodate the important variables that will be used throughout the program; the Arrays that contains all of the product's names, prices, stock, and number of sold items; the ArrayList that will serve as the Cart; and the methods that prints the list of purchasable productsâ€”including their price, current number of stock, and current number of sold items.
    Vouchers
    Contains all the vouchers that the user can use in order to get a free shipping.
